column5: Welcome Glenn,  Hey brickNblock ( oh dear Capt'in of Team LIVIN' 4 FISHIN)  Can we have GlennK on our team- He knows MikeThePike and they're way out in the east ----- perhaps we can have some insider trading/some rackateering/ some corruption/ some no good fixing the number for team 4,  wink, wink, know what I mean say no more,,,  LOL
Frankypro, now that's just cruel.
Welcome aboard! We can forgive the knowing MTP thing....we're good that way and like tjsa said, wont hold that against you.

Hi all,  I just joined last week.  I live in St-Hubert, QC (near Montreal) and do most of my fishing with MikeThePike.  He invited me on a fishing trip with the guys a couple of years ago, and I fell for the sport, hook, line and sinker.  I have a Princecraft Ungava with a 9.9 Honda that I pull behind my hybrid camper.  I do most of my fishing along the St-Lawrence River in Ontario and Quebec.  I fish mostly Walleye, Pike, Bass and Perch.  I look forward to reading your posts and chating with you in the future.  GlennK
Welcome aboard, Glenn!
Welcome to the board GlennK... Dont forget to post some reports with pictures...
Welcome, I'm sure you'll enjoy it around here..
Welcome GlennK

Welcome aboard Glenn! Don't take Glenn in your boat he tends to outfish me when he is in my boat  .Now everyone tell Glenn to hurry up with his digital camera purchase so he can post some reports with pictures.

You fish with MTP??, lol, you sorry soul JUST KIDDING!  No worries, you fish for walleye...................and those other species mentioned, not to be repeated, specially the snot rockets, lol At least, you got the species "Walleye" correct, some here call them............................um................pickeral,  I have tried to teach them many times, but they are set in their ways,
Welcome Aboard!
Welcome abaord,,,look forward to your reports!!!

Actually TJSA we call them Dore(DOOREH) here but you guys would be lost if I wrote that .Well not Roy or Thorpie.I am sure Glenn would like to hook up and fish with you but its a long drive to the North Pole lol.
Actually Mike, I do know that they are called Dore, eh!   :lol:  :lol:
Welcome Glenn, look forward to hearing all about your adventures!  Jen
Welcome Glenn!
Welcome to OFC.    Glad to see you joined up ... you'll like it here.
Yup!!  Welcome!
Hey Glenn  Welcome to the best fishing board on the net!  Looking forward to reading about your adventures with MTP!!
Welcome . Looking forward to the reports...
welcome aboard  I would rather call them Dore or pickeral.......but no..many  around here wants to call them walleye...yuppy wannabes
LOL Terry -- yuppie wannabes  I call them Walleye around here and in the states, but in Northern Ontario they are called Pickerel (Or you pay more for bait), Quebec - Dore, Europe - Zander  Tony
THANKS ALL. Next time I will keep it simple.....I fish in Ontario and Quebec
Welcome Glenn, do you have a digital camera??  Pam
Welcome Glenn, looking forward to your reports and pictures when you get a digital camera!
Welcome aboard Glenn
Welcome aboard Glenn, this is a great site  Man if you live around the St.Lawrence you gotta try carp fishing ... that's one of the places on my "to-go" list but it's like 4 hours away ...
Welcome aboard Glenn.
